thing-type.label: ESPHome Device
thing-type.description: ESP32 / ESP8266 device flashed with ESPHome firmware. See esphome.io

parameter.name: deviceId
parameter.label: ESPHome device ID
parameter.description: Used to verify that we're talking to the correct device. Use the esphome: -> name: value from the ESPHome device configuration yaml

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the device

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: IP Port number of the device

parameter.name: encryptionKey
parameter.label: Base64 encoded encryption key for encrypted connection
parameter.description: Specified in the api: -> encryption: -> key: section of the esphome device config. See https://esphome.io/components/api#configuration-variables

parameter.name: allowActions
parameter.label: Allow the device to send actions and events
parameter.description: Actions includes requesting actions be executed, sending events, and scanning tags. See https://esphome.io/components/api/#api-actions

parameter.name: reconnectInterval
parameter.label: Reconnect interval in seconds
parameter.description: Seconds between reconnect attempts when connection is lost or the device restarts.

parameter.name: pingInterval
parameter.label: Ping interval in seconds
parameter.description: Seconds between sending ping requests to the device to check if it is alive

parameter.name: maxPingTimeouts
parameter.label: Number of missed ping requests before deeming the device unresponsive
parameter.description: Ie if pingInterval=10 and this value is 4, the binding will wait a total of 10*4 = 40 seconds before connection is assumed broken, and reconnect starts

parameter.name: connectTimeout
parameter.label: Seconds till a connection attempt to an device is declared as failed
parameter.description: The connection attempt is aborted if it could not be completed after the given number of seconds.

parameter.name: logPrefix
parameter.label: Prefix to use in logging for this particular device. Defaults to Thing ID
parameter.description: Useful when debugging communication with a particular device (and you have many)

parameter.name: deviceLogLevel
parameter.label: Stream device logs with at least this log level
parameter.description: Ensure that your ESPHome YAML config logs at the appropriate level, ie if the device logs at WARN only warn or higher logs may be shipped to openHAB even if you specify INFO here. Log statements are logged to the 'ESPHOMEDEVICE' logger at level INFO. Adjust your log4j.xml config file to redirect device logs to ie a sepearate file.

parameter.name: enableBluetoothProxy
parameter.label: Enable Bluetooth proxying (experimental)
parameter.description: Ensure your ESPHome configuration contains the bluetooth_proxy configuration element. Only works for broadcasting devices ie BTHome devices such as Shelly BLU, b-parasite plant sensors etc. 2-way communication is not yet supported. See https://bthome.io/
